Keywords: Mystical
Real Name: Wong
Team Up
1
TEAM UP: DR. STRANGE: If Wong and the listed friendly character are on the map, they both can use Mastermind but only to choose friendly characters with the Mystical keyword.
Special Powers
DIMENSIONAL GATEWAY THROUGH THE MULTIVERSE: Phasing/Teleport. // Once per turn, when an adjacent friendly character with the Mystical keyword begins a move, after resolutions you may place Wong in a square adjacent to them.
GUARDING THE SANCTUM: Energy Shield/Deflection, Willpower.
Trade Wong Want Wong

Comments
December 11, 2022
tidge
I have mixed feelings about this piece. I think this is reasonable dial for a throwback version of a "manservant" Wong, both in terms of powers and dial cost. I feel like the Team Up card power ought to have been baked in to the default dial, even though I understand that the limitations on TUC make it easier to simply restrict the effect to only two characters. I rather like this piece's ability to 'tag team' with any mystical (keyword) buddy to potentially followup with a 3-damage attack (or Support roll!). This is a piece that is wonderful for certain thematic play, yet is sure to be eclipsed by the brutal effects of power creep elsewhere.
November 2, 2022
Kaden
None of that works the way ya'll are thinking. The placement is after resolutions. So you'd finish the running shot action, then place Wong adjacent.
October 15, 2022
pokolo
^^ ah yes that’s a nasty combo… add BTAS Zatanna and her bats for some extra damage boost! And perplex the attack up once more for good measure! Yeah I like this figure Only other issue is his range but there’s ways to fix that too…

itsJJ22
Pokolo, After lets say, Dr strange uses running shot with Pen carrying Agnes Bunny then wong can swoop in attack for 11 dealing 4 damage.
September 28, 2022
pokolo
The free place has some alpha strike potential… if you can find a way to bump up his attack and damage this has some sneaky potential.

Sure isn't going to see any play at 40 points. Decent enhancement piece at 30 though. I'd rather him just have 2 damage at 25 points.
